exceptions.tactic: intros f g n x Hfg.
intros f' g n x Hfg.
intros f' g n' x Hfg.
intros f' g n' x' Hfg.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hfg was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.
The LHS of IHn (Derive_n (fun y : R => f (y + b)) n x) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment f : R -> R n : nat x, b : R IHn : Derive_n (fun y : R => f (y + b)) n x = Derive_n f n (x + b) Unable to unify "x + b" with "x".
The reference Hfg was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f g n x Hfg. induction n. -- simpl. apply Hfg. -- simpl. rewrite IHn. apply Derive_ext_loc. intros t. apply Hfg.
